meanings.definition: A board with holes into which pegs are fitted, used for hanging tools or other objects.
meanings.sent1: My dad hung his tools on the pegboards in the garage.
meanings.sent2: The pegboards in the workshop help keep everything organized.
meanings.sent3: I pretended the pegboards were a mini climbing wall for my action figures.
meanings.sent4: The pegboards in the kitchen became a colorful mosaic of utensils.
meanings.sent5: The pegboards in the shed made finding the right tool a breeze.

meanings.definition: To fasten or secure with pegs on a pegboard.
meanings.sent1: She carefully pegboards the picture frame to the wall.
meanings.sent2: We need to pegboards the shelf securely in place.
meanings.sent3: He tried to pegboards his homework together, but the dog ate it.
meanings.sent4: The team will pegboards the tent down before the wind picks up.
meanings.sent5: I always pegboards my keys by the door so I don't lose them.
